South Taranaki church to mark Waitangi Day with a bilingual service https://www.nzherald.co.nz/stratford-press/news/south-taranaki-church-to-mark-waitangi-day-with-a-bilingual-service/2KCZU4EC7VBTLG5LOQWRJ7O6LU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/stratford-press/news/south-taranaki-church-to-mark-waitangi-day-with-a-bilingual-service/2KCZU4EC7VBTLG5LOQWRJ7O6LU/ Ilona HanneAll are welcome to the service, which will be followed by shared kai. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 21:00:00 +0000 The altar in Eltham's All Saints Church was carved in the early 1900s by Gretchen Briant, and is inscribed in both te reo Māori and English.
Bryant ‘B-Man’ McKenzie’s mystery death at 20: Firefighters on callout devastated to find one of their own https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wallacetown-volunteer-firefighter-bryant-b-man-mckenzie-was-anyones-friend/FRTOIOHSAJDG7OZP2DCI5HPBJA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wallacetown-volunteer-firefighter-bryant-b-man-mckenzie-was-anyones-friend/FRTOIOHSAJDG7OZP2DCI5HPBJA/ Toni McDonald20-year-old firefighter Bryant 'B-Man' McKenzie was a 'firecracker of a human being'. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 20:34:14 +0000 Wallacetown man Bryant "B-Man" McKenzie was a community-minded person who loved the outdoors.
Oamaru crash victim Stacy Ray Henderson known for good humour and love of music https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/oamaru-crash-victim-known-for-good-humour-and-love-of-music/N7RSSUHF35CDNBTLA4E73U76AA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/oamaru-crash-victim-known-for-good-humour-and-love-of-music/N7RSSUHF35CDNBTLA4E73U76AA/ Jules ChinThe Oamaru man had 'strong family values' and really loved his children. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 19:26:57 +0000 Stacy Ray Henderson has been remembered for his love of music.
Odometer tampering and engine failure leave woman with undrivable $17,000 car as car yard liquidates https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/odometer-tampering-and-engine-failure-leave-woman-with-undrivable-17000-car-as-car-yard-liquidates/AJXPHE4QQ5E5VPFTRIRSHHMFKI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/odometer-tampering-and-engine-failure-leave-woman-with-undrivable-17000-car-as-car-yard-liquidates/AJXPHE4QQ5E5VPFTRIRSHHMFKI/ Kirsty WynnClock was wound back 134km but caryard liquidates leaving no refund options. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 19:12:31 +0000 The woman bought the car thinking it had only done 50,000km but later found it had more than 184,000 on the clock.
Qantas ticket errors: Customers pay three times for flights, wait four months for refund https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/qantas-ticketing-errors-had-customers-pay-third-times-for-flights-and-wait-four-months-for-refund/U33RLBIJIFETDCYD3KLHKTVDJ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/qantas-ticketing-errors-had-customers-pay-third-times-for-flights-and-wait-four-months-for-refund/U33RLBIJIFETDCYD3KLHKTVDJ4/ Shannon PitmanThe airline has been ordered to pay passengers compensation. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 19:00:00 +0000 Passengers spent more than 14 hours on the phone trying to correct ticketing errors by Qantas. Photo / 123RF
Canny View: Retirement should be a time to enjoy life, without a creeping source of anxiety https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/canny-view-retirement-should-be-a-time-to-enjoy-life-without-a-creeping-source-of-焦虑/TVPBHGCUK5GIJHIUI3A45QUD5E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/canny-view-retirement-should-be-a-time-to-enjoy-life-without-a-creeping-source-of-焦虑/TVPBHGCUK5GIJHIUI3A45QUD5E/ Nick StewartThere are many ‘rules of thumb’ about retirement planning, but no magic number. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 19:00:00 +0000 Nick Stewart says financial stress can be a huge burden, and the best way to get around it is to start your journey early, and create a plan for success.
Six-car crash in South Auckland: Two people suffer serious injuries in Manurewa https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/multiple-car-crash-in-south-auckland-two-people-suffer-serious-injuries/KLWEAHPAVFCXLCTXCGBDFSKVEE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/multiple-car-crash-in-south-auckland-two-people-suffer-serious-injuries/KLWEAHPAVFCXLCTXCGBDFSKVEE/ Emergency services were called to the scene about 9.30pm. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 18:47:03 +0000 A St John spokesperson said they sent one operations manager and three ambulances to the accident on Hill Rd about 9.30pm.
Weather: Auckland Anniversary Weekend to see showers across country, thunder possible on Sunday https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-auckland-anniversary-weekend-to-see-showers-across-country-thunder-possible-on-sunday/QLCET2ILSZA5TM3YAY5TMOXL5E/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-auckland-anniversary-weekend-to-see-showers-across-country-thunder-possible-on-sunday/QLCET2ILSZA5TM3YAY5TMOXL5E/ Raphael FranksRain should start in upper North Island later Saturday evening, then set in for weekend. Photo / Sarah Ivey
